quote: Think, think, think.
author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: I think to think. Not to be thought-full, or to reach a point of wisdom or acquire a grace of knowledge. I think for the sensuality of thought.
author: Ilyas Kassam

quote: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that - thoughts.
author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Whenever I think of something but can't think of what it was I was thinking of, I can't stop thinking until I think I'm thinking of it again. I think I think too much.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Thoughts Become Things... Choose The Good Ones!
author: Mike Dooley

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
author: Bob Proctor,  You Were Born Rich

quote: Thoughts are one of the most creative powers we have as human beings. If you hold the mantra in your mind that you are continually becoming more healthful and radiant, that is what you will become.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.,  Life's Little Instruction Book

quote: Thoughts do more. Words to much. Actions do much more.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: It's all in the mind.
author: George Harrison

quote: High thoughts must have high language.
author: Aristophanes,  Frogs and Other Plays

quote: We must think beyond ourselves
author: Kevin J. Anderson,  A Forest of Stars

quote: Any ideas, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Thoughts are as simple as the process…a message from the soul; conveyed through the heart; received in the mind
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: I think, therefore I'll think.
author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged: 35th Anniversary Edition

quote: You don’t have to stay trapped in your thoughts just because you think them.
author: Doug Dillon

quote: To think is good. To obsess is bad.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Don't let anyone's negative thoughts infect your beautiful mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your thoughts make what happen in your life~You can turn anything negative into the positive~What you visualize can come true and you attract it to yourself
author: Pattimari Sheets-Diamond

quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: Thought before word, never word before thought.
author: Suzy Kassem,  Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: My heart knows what my mind only think it knows.
author: Noah Benshea,  Jacob the Baker: Gentle Wisdom For a Complicated World

quote: Thinking of death--strange, beautiful, terrible and a long way off--made me feel happier than ever.
author: Dodie Smith,  I Capture the Castle

quote: Dwell on your own sacred thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success.
author: Charles F. Glassman,  Brain Drain The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Your life is a reflection of your thoughts. Think well.
author: Danielle Pierre

quote: A thinker can truly think only when there is true freedom of thought.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Without desires and dreams, your thoughts do not matter and you can think whatever you want to.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: Your thoughts carry you wherever you want to go. Weak thoughts don’t have the energy to carry you far!
author: Israelmore Ayivor,  Leaders' Watchwords

quote: Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I think and think and think, I‘ve thought myself out of happiness one million times, but never once into it.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: What we think, we become
author: Buddha

quote: I try to avoid having thoughts. They lead to other thoughts, and—if you’re not careful—those lead to actions. Actions make you tired. I have this on rather good authority from someone who once read it in a book.
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: Thought is so cunning, so clever, that it distorts everything for its own convenience.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti,  Freedom from the Known

quote: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet

quote: Our thoughts make everything possible in this impossible world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Think with your whole body.
author: Taisen Deshimaru

quote: In sum, then, "thinking about thinking"has to be a principal ingredient of any empowering practice of education.
author: Jerome S. Bruner,  The Culture of Education

quote: Think as though the beauty of your life depends on your thoughts. Live as though your life is the portrait of your thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Original Thoughts [10w] Original thoughts are not diminished by days, distance or disregard.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: IT’s All In The Game Of Mind.
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: All truly wise thoughts have been thought already thousands of times; but to make them truly ours, we must think them over again honestly, until they take root in our personal experience.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Only positive thoughts can inspire you to positive actions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don't know, I don't want to talk as much. (...) It's nicer to think dear, pretty thoughts and keep them in one's heart, like treasures. I don't like to have them laughed at or wondered over.
author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne of Green Gables

quote: A thought is harmless unless we believe it. It’s not our thoughts, but our attachment to our thoughts, that causes suffering. Attaching to a thought means believing that it’s true, without inquiring. A belief is a thought that we’ve been attaching to, often for years.
author: Byron Katie,  Loving What Is: Four Questions That Can Change Your Life

quote: A mind filled with negative thoughts makes you feel miserable and inadequate and will lead to failure after failure no matter how hard you try to succeed.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: You are an infinite being with infinite love and infinite thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha
